Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well, I like you, Mr. Waiter.
Speaker.line2: You really understand what a child wants.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: My sister and I would enjoy this meal a lot!

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: If you were my age, I bet we would be really good friends.
